DOC.detailed_description: This multi-center , randomize , open-label , investigator-initiated study parallel design . Patients type 2 diabetes coronary heart disease microalbuminuric [ urinary albumin excretion ( UAE ) : 30-500 mg/day ] , randomize informed consent , 1:1 ratio follow treatment group : Group Α : Ivabradine 5mg twice day ( day 0 ) , heart rate evaluate day 14 28 repeatedly , target value heart rate 50-60bpm , large dosage 7.5mg twice day . Group Β : Placebo . Urinary albumin excretion ( UAE ) assessment perform randomization ( Day 0 ) , 28-day randomization ( Day 28 ) , 90-day randomization ( Day 28 ) .
